embeds.title: Frost Behemoth Information
embeds.description:
> **Duration**: 2 weeks
> **Frequency**: Available 2 weeks every Broken Lands. Begins on the 2nd week of Broken Lands.
> **Alternate Names**: Frost, Frosty, Frostie
> **Event Type**: Player (against Broken Lands)
> **Note**: Only available if you are in Broken Lands.

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
The objective is to reach the highest possible level of Frost Behemoth.

Select the Frost Behemoth icon and summon it. You will have the option to ATTACK or RALLY. Select the option that is applicable based on the power of the Frost Behemoth. Attack costs 10AP (or less with AP heroes), while Rally costs 20AP (or less with AP heroes).

As you reach the higher levels of Frosty Behemoth and need to rally, you can set a power limit to the rally in order to pull stronger troops from your alliance to beat it. Using Quick Rally is another method to pull the troops at a faster pace. See #Tips&Tricks

Note: If you do not manage to kill the Frost Behemoth, it will remain in place for 1 hour before it disappears.

How to set up a Rally Power Limit:
1. Click on the Frost Behemoth.
2. Click on the swords icon.
3. Type the minimum power of troops you want entering your rally.
4. Check the box if you want these settings to be applied for each rally (optional).

fields.name: Rewards
fields.value:
For each Frost Behemoth killed, you will receive 2000 points on your Broken Landâ€™s Personal Scoreboard and Kingdom Scoreboard.

At the end of Broken Lands, you will also receive a personal reward based on your Frost ranking across the entire Broken Lands. Rewards differ over time and based on which season you are in.

__Reward for Frosty Behemoth__

fields.name: Embassy Recommendation
fields.value: Always use AP-saving heroes (especially Miku) for attacking and rallying Frost Behemoths to save AP. Because the initial levels of Frost are very repetitive, many players use an auto clicker to get through those stages. At later stages, use Quick Rally to pull troops.
